title: Front Direction Indicators - Installation

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Note the routing of the direction indicator harnesses for installation.
The right hand direction indicator harness can be identified by the red tape on it.
Position the direction indicator clamp end between the upper and lower yokes and fit the front fork (see

Route the direction indicator harness as noted for removal and connect it to the main harness within the headstock. The main harness for the right hand direction indicator is marked with red tape to aid correct connection.
Refit the rubber band securing the harnesses to the clutch cable.
Refit the cable guide with two new fixings and tighten to
Position the front direction indicator as noted for removal and tighten the new fixing to
Fuel Tank Refit DV; DVX; DVY; DW; DW4; DX4; DWB; DVB

body.body: Battery Reconnect DV; DVX; DW; DW4; DX4; DWB; DVB

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DVB; DWB; DX4; DW4; DW; DVX; DV

body.body: Check the operation of the direction indicators, rectify as necessary.
